QuestData.Title: Bearer of Good Fortune
QuestData.Description: This key appears to be for the animal cages spread throughout Cliffspring Hollow. Tharnariun would surely appreciate if you took advantage of the situation to free some of the uncorrupted duskrats and thistle bears that are still being held captive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 8 Uncorrupted Thistle Bears or Uncorrupted Duskrats from the cages in Cliffspring Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: I am pleased to hear that you were able to free some of the remaining wildlife. With a bit of good fortune, we will find the cure for the corruption that the others have faced before any more of them die.
